text: Wolfgang "Wolf" Helmut Berger (5 October 1937 â€“ 6 August 2017) was a German- American oceanographer, geologist, micropaleontologist and emeritus professor at the Scripps Institution of Oceanography, University of California, San Diego.biographical information from American Men and Women of Science, Thomson Gale 2004 He was born in Erlangen, Germany. His research interests comprise "micropaleontology, marine sedimentation, ocean productivity, carbon cycle, ocean history, climate history, and history of oceanography."Earthguide - about us - Wolf Berger He was elected a foreign member of the Academia Europaea in 2001. Berger died in San Diego, California on 6 August 2017 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * List of publications by Wolfgang H.
